detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: Because we are a small and tightly knit firm, we will get to know you and you will get to know us. The more we understand your personal and professional situation, the better we are able to represent you and successfully fulfill your specific needs.

detailsData.title: Team Collaboration
detailsData.content: Our team has a variety of strengths and backgrounds which allows us to collaborate and work together to get the results you are seeking on your case. When you hire The Hahn Legal Group APC, you have the confidence knowing you will be working with a group of lawyers committed to your case.

detailsData.title: Client Accessibility
detailsData.content: We put a premium on the accessibility of our lawyers and our support staff. We are committed to providing you with professional support every step of the way and will ensure that all of your inquiries, phone calls, emails or texts are promptly returned.

detailsData.title: Courtroom Expertise
detailsData.content: Working a courtroom is our specialty. Every jurisdiction and every courtroom has its own rules, regulations and way of doing things. We have experience representing our clients in Southern, Central and Northern California.

address: 2121 Rosecrans Avenue, Suite 4300, El Segundo, CA 90245
subHeading: Defending Your Today, Protecting Your Tomorrow
valueProp: A team of skilled civil lawyers dedicated to smart, aggressive and strategic advocacy. Our lawyers are committed to providing clients with high-caliber and dynamic representation aimed at achieving successful results through negotiations, mediations, arbitrations and trials in both California and Federal courts.

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
